question: In which part of the Iberian Peninsula is Teruel, Spain situated?
asked_question_translated: Di bagian mana dari Semenanjung Iberia yang terletak di Teruel, Spanyol?
answer: Teruel terletak di bagian timur laut dari Semenanjung Iberia, Spanyol.
answer_translated_eng: Teruel is located in the north-eastern part of the Iberian Peninsula, Spain.
